name: Trello mobile app recreation
description:
This is a recreation of Trello's Android app, as precisely as I could make it. I use list-based and card-based interactions a lot, so I wanted to see how closely I could match Trello's product before I mangle those designs for other apps and services. I think it's pretty close!
